snippet.title: Backflip Madness
snippet.description:
Backflip Madness is a fast-paced, parkour-flavored extreme sports game. Your goal is simple - make tons of spectacular tricks and stunts. Take it to the extreme!

Features:
- Multiple backflips and locations
- Parkour/Free running acrobatics
- Realistic physics
- Achievements, Challanges and Leaderboards (Scoreloop)
- 3 difficulty levels
- Action replay
- Normal and ninja outfits

Get it on iTunes:
https://apps.apple.com/app/backflip-madness/id564874986?mt=8

Get in on Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamesoulstudio.backflipmadness

Get it on Amazon appstore
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0092C2X7U

macOS (Mac App Store):
https://apps.apple.com/app/backflip-madness/id1450080072?mt=12

macOS (Direct link to demo version):
http://bit.ly/bfmdmac
